Mokou seems like she'd be a fun drinking buddy. Unlike Yuugi who just wants to drink until she passes out. Mokou would be the more relaxed one. Just pour some scotch, turn on the jazz, and relax. As for Cirno, I have a weakness for cute small things.

topics.body:
*DING!*
(someone is talking about touhou)
"But I'm playing STALKER"
*DING!*
"Later"
*DING!*
"But I'm on the final level!"
*DING!*
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c9e3ab63687274bd4b0500#post_54c9e3ab63687274bd4b0500
Joking aside the new game should be coming out soonish.  It might be in English too.  I would like to see Hata No Kokoro in it though; it might happen cause lately Zun in the games seems to be expanding on the current characters.  Call me optimistic, but if it is coming out in the west then chances are they're going to put a lot of effort into "Urban Legend in Limbo" than they normally do; sure you can argue "well they always put a lot of effort into the games" what I mean is that if your game is coming out in another language that covers 300 million people and officially for the first time then you're going to damn make sure it's successful.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c9e67b63687234f8770b00#post_54c9e67b63687234f8770b00
How much has it changed?  I remember you suggesting I watch the original and I got ten minutes into and lost interest.  If it's better then I might watch one of the newer ones.

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c9f3276368724733f21100#post_54c9f3276368724733f21100
While I'll always hold Goodfellas as Scorsese's opus, Gangs of New York was a magnificent film. The direction was spot on, the shots were excellent, the pacing was AMAZING.
